awakening.name: Elite

awakening.name: Perfection

fashion.name: Overlooking the Gray
fashion.description: The girl stood here and watched.

Increase final damage by **18%**.
When equipped with **Wicked**, increase final damage by an additional **6%**.

Increase final damage by **18%**.
Increase **EP-7000 Skyfire's** flame damage by **30%**.

fashion.name: Infiltrating Shadow
fashion.description: Concealed within the depths of darkness, it seamlessly infiltrates, leaving no trace but an air of mystique.

awakening.name: Fluorescence

awakening.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. When Pactcrest ☆ Metz is equipped, increase final damage by an additional **6%**. When **Benediction Resonance** is active, the additional increase in final damage affects nearby teammates as well. This effect does not stack.

fashion.name: Sleep Talking
fashion.description: Scientists are helpless in their dreams, where logic and the laws of nature cease to matter. People who have retained a childlike imagination, on the other hand, are able to enjoy themselves very much in their dreams.

awakening.name: Regulations
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **14%**. For every 1 physical weapon equipped, increase normal attack damage of **Equilibrium** by **10%**, up to **20%**.

awakening.name: Order
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Equilibrium** is equipped, increase physical damage dealt to targets with less than **80%** of HP by **10%**. For every 1 physical weapon equipped, increase normal attack damage of **Equilibrium** by **20%**, up to **40%**.

nitai.description: Instructions for Equilibrium. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Starting Tune
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **13%**.

awakening.name: Lingering Note
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When **Purple Bamboo** is in the main slot, for every **1** non-altered weapon equipped, increase all elemental damage by **8%**.

fashion.name: Tranquil Melody
fashion.description: Under the clear sky and falling flowers, the bamboo beneath the eaves sing a tranquil melody. Playing the zither and flute, the pavilions and terraces as they were, these moments can linger a little longer.

nitai.title: Nan Yin: Purple Bamboo

awakening.name: Overwatching Blade
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **1%**.

awakening.name: Governing Blade
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, gain damage immunity for **4** seconds when using **Sword Art: Icy Beckon** (unavailable in Apex League). For every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **2.5%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, gain an additional **350** weapon charge after the Wanderer uses any frost weapon skill. After using any frost weapon's skill or discharge other than **Alabaster Tiger's**, deal additional damage equal to **1,456%** of ATK to nearby targets.

fashion.name: Summer Frost
fashion.description: Basking under the brilliant sun, summer frost blooms.

awakening.name: Lotus Dance
awakening.description: After using **Whirling**, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **4.5%** for **30** seconds.

awakening.name: Darkshadow
awakening.description: After using **Whirling**, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **9%** for **30** seconds.

awakening.name: Bamboo Splints
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **13%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **6%**.

awakening.name: Jade Luster
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **6%**, and crit rate boost duration is additionally extended by **25** seconds.

fashion.name: Serene Grove
fashion.description: Amidst the clear breeze, within the serene bamboo grove.

nitai.title: Huang: Azure Dragon
nitai.description: Instructions for Azure Dragon. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Find Oneself
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **12%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is **Onyx Tortoise**, normal attack damage is increased by **30%**.

awakening.name: Selfless
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is **Onyx Tortoise**, normal attack damage is increased by **50%**.

fashion.name: Zeke
fashion.description: Seemingly having undergone a prolonged seclusion, perhaps even immersing herself in ink to contemplate the true essence of elegance, Liu Huo reappears before us. Her aura, now visibly enhanced, signifies a deepened understanding of grace... a noticeable transformation.

nitai.title: Ming Jing: Onyx Tortoise
nitai.description: Unlock Onyx Tortoise to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Ming Jing, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Ming Jing: Onyx Tortoise
nitai.description: Instructions for Onyx Tortoise. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Steady Qi
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **13%**.
While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.
While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming **Fighting Spirit** by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

awakening.name: Attention
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.
While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming **Fighting Spirit** by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

nitai.description: Unlock Unity to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Yu Lan, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Yu Lan: Unity
nitai.description: Instructions for Unity. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Counting Ink
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increases to **1** per second.

awakening.name: Taking Up the Brush
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increases to **1** per second.
When **Sparrow Feather** hits and triggers the spreading effect, it additionally spreads **Ion Scorch** and **Cross Burn**.
In team play, your damage taken from the aggroed target is reduced by **5%**. When Fortitude Resonance is activated, the damage reduction increases to **8%**.

fashion.name: Inkwell Refinement
fashion.description: Seemingly having undergone a prolonged seclusion, perhaps even immersing herself in ink to contemplate the true essence of elegance, Liu Huo reappears before us. Her aura, now visibly enhanced, signifies a deepened understanding of grace... a noticeable transformation.

awakening.description: Increase volt damage by **6%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped.

awakening.name: Enlightenment
awakening.description: Increase volt damage by **8%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped. The amount of time that Grayspace Entities are controlled by Seal is increased to **120** seconds.

fashion.name: Brilliant Eclipse
fashion.description: Continuation and destruction merge into her sole thought.

nitai.description: Instructions for Lost Art. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Gnonno: Ripples
awakening.description: After **Exploration Team Strike** triggers **Total Berserk**, increase final damage by **12%** for **30** seconds.

awakening.name: Gnonno: Tidal Wave
awakening.description:
After **Exploration Team Strike** triggers **Total Berserk**, increase final damage by **23%** for **30** seconds.
While diving, increase movement speed by **50%**.

nitai.title: Gnonno: Mini Hurricane
nitai.description: Instructions for Mini Hurricane. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Twinkle
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **16%**.

awakening.name: Moon Reflection
awakening.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
**Scatter Technique Enhancement:**
Hydro Focus Enhancement: Increase all elemental damage by **12%**.
Vortex Enhancement: If **Moonstar Bracelet** is in the main slot, damage caused by Vortex is increased by **30%**.
Torrential Force Enhancement: Increase discharge damage by **12%**.
Maelstrom Enhancement: When dealing physical damage while Maelstrom is in effect, gain an additional final damage boost, up to **33%** (maxes out in 10 seconds).
Aqua Shackles Enhancement: Aqua Prison duration is extended to **5** seconds while Benediction Resonance is active, and Aqua Prison's base resistance reduction is increased to **10%**.
Wellspring Enhancement: Resistance is increased by (**Max HP**/**100,000**)% while Fortitude Resonance is active, for a maximum of **10%**.

fashion.name: Starlit Honor
fashion.description: The moon and the stars, just for you.

nitai.title: Fiona: Moonstar Bracelet
nitai.description: Unlock Moonstar Bracelet to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Fiona, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Fiona: Moonstar Bracelet
nitai.description: Instructions for Moonstar Bracelet. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Hoarfrost
awakening.description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **10%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **20%**.

awakening.name: Molten Feathers
awakening.description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **15%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **45%**.

nitai.title: Icarus: Precious One
nitai.description: Unlock Precious One to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Icarus, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Icarus: Precious One
nitai.description: Instructions for Precious One. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Raging Fire
awakening.description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **16%**.

awakening.name: Towering Flames
awakening.description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **24%**, and final damage is increased by **8%**.

fashion.name: Ivory Bloom
fashion.description: Thank you for staying courageous and holding my hand, even when faced with danger.

nitai.title: Lan: Vermilion Bird
nitai.description: Unlock Vermilion Bird to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Lan, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Lan: Vermilion Bird
nitai.description: Instructions for Vermilion Bird. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Dimension X
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **18%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

awakening.name: Dimension Z
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **23%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

fashion.name: Fluffy White Chocolate
fashion.description: In winter, a full set of fluffy clothes is a necessity, including your ears! Also, don't forget to spray on some sweet, milky white chocolate perfume before you leave the house!

nitai.title: Fenrir: Gleipnir
nitai.description: Unlock Gleipnir to venture in the Tower of Fantasy world as Fenrir, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Fenrir: Gleipnir
nitai.description: Instructions for Gleipnir. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Umi: Good Show
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **12%** for **30** seconds whenever Umi uses **It's Magic Time**. This effect does not stack.

awakening.name: Umi: Grand Performance
awakening.description: Increase final damage by **18%** for **30** seconds whenever Umi uses **It's Magic Time**. This effect does not stack.

fashion.name: Millet Wonderland
fashion.description: A costume that Umi ordered for a fairly formal performance, in which she will play the heir to the Millet Castle and bring fantastic dreams to "guests" that stumble upon this place.

nitai.title: Umi: Mobius
nitai.description: Unlock Unity to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Yu Lan, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Umi: Mobius
nitai.description: Instructions for Mobius. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Anisoptera
awakening.description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **13%** for **12** seconds.

awakening.name: Lepidoptera
awakening.description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **18%** for **18** seconds. After Unyielding Wing is advanced to 1 star, receive Alyss's support when using a **physical/flame/volt** weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward.

fashion.name: Platinum Radiance
fashion.description: Shortly after Alyss's headache was cured, Mirroria Department of Science and Technology discovered previously unknown information in the Unyielding Wing. By reconstructing the data and importing it to the Unyielding Wing, they created a new Platinum Armor Form that differs from Anisoptera or Lepidoptera.

nitai.title: Alyss: Unyielding Wing
nitai.description: Unlock Unyielding Wing to venture in the world of Tower of Fantasy as Alyss, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Alyss: Unyielding Wing
nitai.description: Instructions for Unyielding Wing. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Gas (boom!)
awakening.description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **8%** for **20** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

awakening.name: Gas (boooom!)
awakening.description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **15%** for **20** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

fashion.name: No Fear of the Sun
fashion.description: UV rays are the enemy of all women... But she seems to enjoy bathing in the sunlight.

nitai.title: Annabella: Clover Cross
nitai.description: Unlock Clover Cross to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Annabella, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Annabella: Clover Cross
nitai.description: Instructions for Clover Cross. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Tian Lang: Thunderball
awakening.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **2** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **12%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

awakening.name: Tian Lang: Thunderclap
awakening.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **3** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **18%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

nitai.title: Tian Lang: Thunderbreaker
nitai.description: Unlock Thunderbreaker to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Tian Lang, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Tian Lang: Thunderbreaker
nitai.description: Instructions for Thunderbreaker. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Heartswitch
awakening.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by 10% for the entire team. Unstackable.

awakening.name: Bless
awakening.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by 10% for the entire team. This effect cannot be stacked. Additionally, increase your Max HP by 10%. Each time you successfully use the skill while having hyperbody or more than 50% HP, grant hyperbody to all allies for 8 seconds.

nitai.title: Lyra: Vesper
nitai.description: Unlock Vesper to venture in the world of Tower of Fantasy as Lyra, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Lyra: Vesper
nitai.description: Instructions for Vesper. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Lin: Epiphyllum Blossom
awakening.description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **15%**.

awakening.name: Lin: Epiphyllum Glamour
awakening.description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **20%**. Reduce all resistance of targets by **7%** upon hit by epiphyllums for **7** seconds. This effect does not stack.

fashion.name: Sleek Summer Shade
fashion.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.

fashion.name: Azure Heart
fashion.description: "Maybe I would be wearing this if I had gone to Innars for work, rather than stay in Mirroria." Perhaps this is the reality of another universe.

nitai.title: Lin: Shadoweave
nitai.description: Unlock Shadoweave to venture in the world of Tower of Fantasy as Lin, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Lin: Shadoweave
nitai.description: Instructions for Shadoweave. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Saki Fuwa: Fortitude State
awakening.description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%**.

awakening.name: Saki Fuwa: Guarding Sword
awakening.description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%** with an extra **60%** increased frost resistance. In the state of Silent Flow: After the sword shadow releases Surge and blocks an attack, the teammate with the lowest HP percentage will get 3 block abilities, not including yourself, lasting for **10** seconds. The maximum blocking damage does not exceed **15%** of the teammate's Max HP.

fashion.name: Ultimate Pure White
fashion.description: "Ultimate justice! Ultimate valor! The Ultimate Warriors who give Night City ultimate protection! Elegant, pure, mighty! Super, super ultimate!"

nitai.title: Saki Fuwa: Heartstream
nitai.description: Unlock Heartstream to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Saki Fuwa, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Saki Fuwa: Heartstream
nitai.description: Instructions for Heartstream. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Dreamcatcher
awakening.description: Increases the flame damage taken by all enemies within **5** meters of Dolly by **8%**. This effect does not stack.

awakening.name: Dolly's Domain
awakening.description: Increases the flame damage received by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by **8%**. Not stackable. Increases flame ATK after throwing Dolly by **12%** for **10** seconds. This effect does not stack.

fashion.name: Crimson Song
fashion.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!

nitai.title: Ruby: Spark
nitai.description: Unlock Spark to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Ruby, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Ruby: Spark
nitai.description: Instructions for the Spark. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Freeze
awakening.description: Upon entering battle, gain **1.5%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds . Stack up to **10** times.

awakening.name: Icebound
awakening.description: Upon entering battle, gain **2.4%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds, with up to **10** stacks. Also, gain hyperbody and immunity to control effects while in the Frost Domain.

nitai.title: Frigg
nitai.description: One of the Angels of Clemency created by Heirs of Aida, designated as Number 2. A towering, efficient walking humanoid weapon.

awakening.name: Nemesis: Metamorphosis
awakening.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **60%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **120%** of ATK.

awakening.name: Nemesis: Sublimation
awakening.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **100%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **200%** of ATK.

fashion.name: Shirli
fashion.description: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.

nitai.title: Nemesis
nitai.description: The unrecognizable appearance, the psychotic mind... Can all this really make Shirli happy? Electrical interference can perhaps short out some of the circuits and ease her pain.

awakening.name: Zero: Accurate Calculation
awakening.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **1.5** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

awakening.name: Zero: Overall Planning
awakening.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **3** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

nitai.title: Zero: Negating Cube
nitai.description: Unlock Negating Cube to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Zero, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Zero: Negating Cube
nitai.description: Instructions for Omnium weapons. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Ene: Fast Mode
awakening.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **12%**.

awakening.name: Ene: Beyond Limits Mode
awakening.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **20%**.

nitai.title: Ene: Pummeler
nitai.description: Unlock Pummeler to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Ene, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Ene: Pummeler
nitai.description: Instructions for hammers. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Meryl: Cool Rose
awakening.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **20%**, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by **50%**.

awakening.name: Meryl: Frosted
awakening.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **25%**, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by **50%**. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.

nitai.title: Meryl: Rosy Edge
nitai.description: Unlock Rosy Edge to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Meryl, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Meryl: Rosy Edge
nitai.description: Instructions for greatswords. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Echo: Uprightness
awakening.description: When teamed up with Echo, allies within **10** meters around Echo gain a damage boost of **4%** (excluding Echo).

awakening.name: Echo: Determination
awakening.description: When teamed up with Echo, allies within **10** meters around Echo gain a damage boost of **6%** (excluding Echo).

nitai.title: Echo: Thunderous Halberd
nitai.description: Unlock Thunderous Halberd to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Echo, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Echo: Thunderous Halberd
nitai.description: Instructions for long spears. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Samir: Trickery
awakening.description: Grant **1** stack of Concentration for every **4** seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by **3%**, and can stack up to **4** times. After being hit, Samir loses **1** stack of Concentration, up to **1** stack per **1** second.

awakening.name: Samir: Shadow
awakening.description: Grant **1** stack of Concentration for every **4** seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by **4%**, and can stack up to **5** times. After being hit, Samir loses **1** stack of Concentration, up to **1** stack per **2** second.

nitai.title: Samir: Dual EM Stars
nitai.description: Unlock Dual EM Stars to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Samir, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Samir: Dual EM Stars
nitai.description: Instructions for dual pistols. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Huma: Fortitude
awakening.description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.4%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.6%** HP.

awakening.name: Huma: Iron Screen
awakening.description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.6%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.9%** HP.

nitai.title: Huma: Molten Shield V2
nitai.description: Unlock Molten Shield V2 to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Huma, the weapon's Simulacrum.

nitai.title: Huma: Molten Shield V2
nitai.description: Instructions for shield axe. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.

awakening.name: Tsubasa: Rainstorm
awakening.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.5%** ATK, up to **15** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

awakening.name: Tsubasa: Raging Waves
awakening.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.6%** ATK, up to **30** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

awakening.name: Shiro: Security Alert
awakening.description: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by **10%** and physical ATK by an additional **7%** for **8** seconds. Cooldown: **16** seconds.

awakening.name: Shiro: Red Alarm
awakening.description: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by **16%** and physical ATK by an additional **10%** for **8** seconds. Cooldown: **16** seconds.

awakening.name: KING: Fear Reaper

awakening.name: Cobalt-B: Sparks
awakening.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **90** to **180** points.

fashion.name: Argent Intuition
fashion.description: It's difficult to find a balance between formal attire and work clothes. Only she insists that true art is a mix of practicality and artistry...

awakening.name: Cocoritter: Trust
awakening.description: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing and healing received by **20%**. And when Cocoritter uses a support-type weapon's discharge skill or weapon skill, increase nearby allies' ATK by **15%** for **5** seconds.
